space_management.join_table_description: Jump into an ongoing game! Join a table if you're free and ready to play.

phone_number.label: Club Phone Number
phone_number.info: The main contact number for the club that will be shown to users.

club_name.label: Club Name
club_name.info: The name of the club that will be displayed to users.

average_max_capacity.label: Average Max Capacity
average_max_capacity.info: Represents the average number of people the club can accommodate at one time.

challenge_rewards_count_for_period.label: Challenge Rewards Count For Period
challenge_rewards_count_for_period.info: Defines how many rewards a user can earn during a single reset period.

challenge_initiation_delay_hours.label: Challenge Initiation Delay Hours
challenge_initiation_delay_hours.info: Number of hours to wait before a new challenge becomes active after being triggered.

reset_day_for_rewards.label: Reset Day For Rewards
reset_day_for_rewards.info: Day of the week when rewards reset at 12:00 PM (e.g., every Monday at noon).

days_off.label: Days Off
days_off.info: Days of the week when the club is closed.

start_working_hours.label: Start Hour
start_working_hours.info: The hour when the club opens for the day.

end_working_hours.label: End Hour
end_working_hours.info: The hour when the club closes for the day.

reservation_hours.label: Reservation Hours
reservation_hours.info: Set the available time slots for reservations based on the club‚Äôs operating hours. Multiple time slots can be selected.

bonus_time_after_reservation_expiration.label: Bonus Time After Reservation Expiration
bonus_time_after_reservation_expiration.info: Extra grace time (in minutes) after a reservation ends before it is considered expired.

period_of_reward_reset.label: Period Of Reward Reset
period_of_reward_reset.info: How often the reward count resets for users ‚Äî weekly or monthly.

is_custom_period_on.label: Is Custom Period On
is_custom_period_on.info: ‚ö†Ô∏è Every time you switch this setting from Off to On, you will be redirected to the Custom Period tab in Challenge Manager. If no challenges or rewards are set up there, you must complete the setup before you can leave.

controls_menu.info_description: Configure key settings for your club‚Äôs operations, challenges, and reservations. Adjust values to fit your club‚Äôs needs and ensure a smooth experience for all users.

phone_number.label: Phone Number
phone_number.info: Provide a phone number where the club can reach you regarding updates or inquiries.

theme.label: UI Theme
theme.info: UI Theme of the application interface

controls_menu.info_description: Manage space-related settings such as contact details, visibility, and preferences to ensure accurate and personalized club usage.

landing.info: The all-in-one platform to streamline operations, boost engagement, and grow your gaming-focused venue.
landing.club_game_management_desc: Effortlessly organize your tables, games, and schedules in one central place.
landing.challenge_rewards_desc: Keep players coming back with engaging challenges and customizable rewards.
landing.activity_tracking_desc: Monitor game sessions and user participation with powerful tracking tools.
landing.event_management_desc: Create, promote, and manage tournaments, weekly events, or private bookings with ease.
landing.reservation_system_desc: Simplify your booking process for tables, games, or events ‚Äî all from one dashboard.
landing.partner_with_us_text: Looking to modernize your entertainment space? Whether you run a board game cafe, darts bar, billiards lounge, or a hybrid venue, DiceHub helps you elevate the experience and grow your community.

delete_dialog.important_note_desc_2: However, it will remain visible to users who have already earned it and will still be shown in the current challenge period.

Custom period initialization will apply on your next scheduled reward reset day.
Period Start: {{periodStart}} at 11:59 PM.
Period End: {{periodEnd}} at 11:59 PM.

You can continue editing your settings until the reset occurs.

Note: The configured challenges and rewards will be the same for all users during the custom period.

reservation_management.no_reservations_message: Your book with active reservations is empty

confirm_dialog.cancel_description: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?

actions.info_message: The reservation expired without a response

instruction.info_description:
Learn how to use the app, including how to reserve games, table,
earn rewards, and explore other important features to enhance your club experience.

reservation.title: Reservations
reservation.summary: Reserve a game, table, or a combination of both

game.title: Game
game.description: Learn how to reserve a game step by step.

how_to_reserve_game.description:
Tap the game library icon in the bottom-left corner. Use the list or search bar to find a game you want to play.
After selecting a game, click on Availability
Select your arrival time and number of players ‚Äî we‚Äôll reserve a table for you.
You‚Äôll be notified when your reservation is approved or declined.
If approved, please arrive 2‚Äì10 minutes before the timer ends.

reservation_approved.description:
Once your reservation is approved, you'll see a QR code and an info panel.
You can access this panel anytime from the red Games Tab in the top-right corner (it will glow when updated).
This panel shows important details and updates about your reservation.

message_from_staff.description: Your info panel may include notes from staff about your reservation ‚Äî make sure to read them.

checking_in_with_qr_code.header: Checking In with Your QR Code
checking_in_with_qr_code.description: Show your QR code to the club staff when you arrive. They‚Äôll scan it to confirm your reservation.

reservation_is_declined.description: If your reservation is not approved, you‚Äôll see a message explaining why it was declined.

no_one_responds_to_reservation.header: If No One Responds to Your Reservation
no_one_responds_to_reservation.description: If your reservation isn‚Äôt acknowledged in time, you‚Äôll get a additional message.

table.title: Table
table.description: Learn how to reserve a table.

how_to_reserve_table.description:
Tap the circular icon with crossed swords at the bottom center of the screen.
Then, tap the top icon to open the Club Space Management page.
There, you can book a table, choosing your arrival time, and entering the number of players.
You‚Äôll receive a notification once your reservation is approved or declined.

reservation_approved.description: If your reservation is approved, a QR code and all reservation details will appear in your info panel under Club Space Management page.

message_from_staff.description: Sometimes, staff may leave you a note in the info panel with important information about your reservation.

reservation_declined.description: If your reservation is not approved, try selecting a different time or day.

combination.title: Combination
combination.description: Learn how to combine both a table and a game reservation into one seamless experience.

reserve_table.description: Start by learning how to book a table. Follow the instructions provided in the link below to secure your spot.

game_reservation.header: Step 2: Game Reservation on the Day of Your Visit
game_reservation.description:
On the day of your table reservation, you‚Äôll receive a special message on the game availability page. This message will include your table details.

Exactly **1 hour before** your reserved time, you‚Äôll be able to select and reserve a game.

Once you request a game reservation, it will either be approved or declined depending on availability.

game_reservation_approved.header: If Your Game Reservation is Approved
game_reservation_approved.description: Great! Both your table and your selected game will be ready and waiting for you at the venue.

game_reservation_declined.header: If Your Game Reservation is Declined
game_reservation_declined.description:
Don‚Äôt worry your table reservation is still confirmed. You can either:

- Try reserving a different game, or
- Arrive and choose from the games available on-site.

manage_room.title: Tip #1 Manage Your Room
manage_room.description: Easily manage your reservation room ‚Äî see who‚Äôs in, update players, and adjust your settings.

Tap the blue circle at the bottom center of the screen. Then tap the first icon at the top.
This will take you to the Club Space Management page, where you can view and manage your reservation room.
From there, you can update your reservation details or remove players if needed.

events.title: Events
events.summary: Join exciting events and connect with the community through games, challenges, and fun activities.

join_event.title: How to Join an Event
join_event.description: Find and join upcoming community events directly from your app.

1. Tap the **Events** tab at the bottom of your screen.
2. Browse through the list of upcoming events.
3. Select an event to view full details like time, date, and description.
4. Tap **Join Event** to secure your spot!

leave_event.title: How to Leave an Event
leave_event.description: Can‚Äôt make it? Easily leave an event you‚Äôve joined.

1. Open the **Events** tab.
2. Go to the **My Events** section.
3. Tap the event you want to leave.
4. Tap **Leave Event** at the bottom of the screen.

notifications.title: Stay Informed with Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified when new events are created.

When your club creates a new event, you'll receive a notification.
Tap the notification to view event details and decide whether to join.

challenges.title: Challenge & Rewards
challenges.summary:
Take part in exciting challenges and earn awesome rewards!
This is your main hub for everything related to challenges, rewards, and friendly competition.

info.title: Challenges
info.description: Learn where, when, and how to complete challenges.

where_to_find.description:
Tap the blue circle at the bottom center of the screen, then tap the middle icon.

This will open your Challenge Page, where you can view both your current challenges and earned rewards.

The first tab (top left) will show whether you're participating in a weekly or monthly challenge period.

how_to_complete.description:
Each challenge tells you which game to play, how many times to play it, and how many points you‚Äôll earn.

These points are added to your total period score.

To successfully complete a challenge, you must start the required game and play it for at least the average game time.

For example: if the average play time for Ghost Stories is 55 minutes, you must play it for at least 55 minutes to get the reward.

when_new_challenges.header: When Do I Get New Challenges?
when_new_challenges.description:
A new challenge is usually generated a few hours after you complete the previous one.
Occasionally, you‚Äôll receive special or time-limited challenges too.

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.description: Find out how to earn and redeem your rewards.

where_to_see.description:
Tap the blue circle at the bottom center, then the middle icon to open the Challenge Page.
Switch to the second tab (top left) to view all the rewards you‚Äôve earned.

how_to_claim.description:
Once you earn a reward, you‚Äôll have a limited number of days to claim it before it expires.

To redeem it, visit the club and press the ‚ÄúUse‚Äù button inside the app.

Show the generated QR code to a staff member to receive your reward.

where_to_view.description:
Go to your Profile page, then find and tap the Challenge Leaderboard section.

You can view your ranking along with the scores of other players.

meeples.title: Meeples
meeples.summary:
Looking for people to play with?
The Meeples section helps you find or create a group of players who want to enjoy the same game as you. Meet new people, connect, and have fun together!

groups.title: Meeple Groups / Find Players
groups.description: Browse and join available groups where players are looking for others to play games with.

view_available.description:
Head to your Meeple page to see a list of open rooms created by other players.
You can browse these and join any group that matches your interest.

create_room.title: Create a Room
create_room.description: Set up your own room and wait for others to join you for a game session.

create.description:
On the Meeple page, tap the green plus (+) button at the top right.
You‚Äôll be taken to the room creation page, where you can set the game, time, and number of players.

join_room.title: Join Room
join_room.description: Join room and meet the new people

join_existing.description:
Browse the list of rooms on the Meeple page.
Tap on a room you‚Äôre interested in to view more details and join it.

room_info_chat.description:
Inside each room, you‚Äôll find details about the selected game, scheduled time, and players.
You can also open the chat to talk to other participants, coordinate, or get updates.

how_to_install.title: Install the App
how_to_install.summary: Get step-by-step instructions on installing the app on your device for easy access anytime and improve your notifications.

android_google_chrome.title: Android Google Chrome Installation
android_google_chrome.description: Learn how to install the app on your Android device using Google Chrome browser.

instal.header: Open the App in Google Chrome
instal.description:
Step 1: Launch Google Chrome on your Android device and navigate to the app's website.

Step 2: Click on the three dots on top right corner.

Step 3: From the dropdown menu, select 'Add to Home screen'.

Step 4: Confirm by tapping 'Install'. The app will be installed and a shortcut will appear on your home screen for easy access.

ios_safari.title: Apple Safari Installation
ios_safari.description: Learn how to install the app on your Apple device using IOS Safari browser.

instal.description:
Step 1: Launch the browser on your Apple device and navigate to the app's website.

Step 2: Tap the Share Button.

Step 3: Choose ‚ÄúAdd to Home Screen‚Äù'.

Step 4: Confirm and add. The app will be installed and a shortcut will appear on your home screen for easy access.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.summary: Information about enabling or unblocking notifications for the app on your device to stay updated with the latest alerts and messages.`

android_unblocked.title: Android: Unblock Your Notifications
android_unblocked.description: Learn how to unblocked notifications for the app on your device.

instal.description:
Step 1: Hold on the application icon on your screen.

Step 2: Tap on 'Site Settings'.

Step 3: Tap On 'Notifications' and Turn ON the 'Show Notifications'. 

Step 4: Restart the application

ios_unblocked.title: Apple-IOS: Unblock Your Notifications
ios_unblocked.description: Learn how to unblocked notifications for the app on your device.

instal.description:
Step 1: Open Settings.

Step 2: Type on the search 'Notifications'.

Step 3: Find the application icon and tab on it 

Step 4: Tap On 'Allow Notifications'. 

Step 5: Restart the application

user_rank.not_any_challenges_completed: Complete a challenge to view your rank.

challenge_leaderboard.no_completed_challenges_1: No challenges were completed during this period.
challenge_leaderboard.no_completed_challenges_2: Try selecting a different time range to see user activity.
challenge_leaderboard.info_message: This leaderboard displays users who have completed challenges, ranked by how many they've successfully finished. Use the tabs above to view rankings for the current week, month, or year.

single_player_confirm_dialog.dialog_header_solo_game: Hey there! Will you be going solo for this game?

club_info.info_description: Here you can find details about the club‚Äôs working hours, contact number, and days off.
